page.title: 17 LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: Crime in Killingworth is quite high in 1985.4 children describe typical offences. HOUSE BURGLARY BY LEE:My house was burgled last year.MumÂ£s wardrobe and bedroom were turned upside down and all jewellery was stolen.Some money,a clock and ny go-cart were also missing. She was very upset. CAR BURGLARY BY LYNDSEY:One night we woke up to find our car had gone.The police found that itÂ£s expensive wheels had been stripped off and the squash things from the boot were taken. PURSUERS BY JACQUELINE:There is a white car following children leaving school and it has also been spotted by the lake where a girl was seen to be dragged into it.
